Package domain.block

Class FunctionDefinitionBlock

java.lang.Object
domain.block.Block
domain.block.FunctionDefinitionBlock
public class FunctionDefinitionBlock
extends Block
An class of FunctionDefinition that extends Block. It has a specified ID, a callstack and a body.
Version:
4.0
Author:
Andreas Awouters Thomas Van Erum Dirk Vanbeveren Geert Wesemael
